description:
Get moving in this classic-cut bikini bottom. Complete coverage and a wide, elasticized waist makes you feel confident in going all out. The fabric's high rating keeps you safe from harmful UV rays.

  • Made from a quick drying blend of nylon and spandex. UPF rated to 50+
  • Ample stretch makes movement easy
  • Fully lined front and back body
  • Modest mid-rise waist and a classic leg cut
  • Machine wash cold, non-chlorine bleach if needed. Tumble dry low, no fabric softener. Cool iron if needed
name: Prana Ramba Bikini Bottoms - Women's
